Program_Policies: A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).; Other courses approved by the program adviser, such as *97, can also be used.

Course_Code: Students who choose Track 1 (Russian language only) must select 12 course credits other than RUS (e.g., HIST, PLSC, ECON,  etc.) from the departmental list of courses in East European area studies (at least two courses must be at the 400-level).
Program_Policies: A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).; Other courses approved by the program adviser, such as *97, can also be used.

Course_Title: Students who choose Track 2, 3, and 4 must select 9 credits from the departmental list of courses in East European area studies (at least two courses must be at the 400-level).
